```lisp
(:action catch
  ; Perform an action to capture, find, or select an item
  :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and 
                  (in_wild ?item) 
                  (at ?p ?loc) 
                  (not (in_bag ?item)) 
                  (not (bag_selected ?item)))
  :effect (and 
           (caught ?item) 
           (in_bag ?item)))

(:action use
  ; Use an item or resource to achieve an effect
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and 
                 (owned ?agent) 
                 (in_inventory ?item) 
                 (inventory_selected ?agent))
  :effect (and 
           (effect_applied ?target) 
           (not (in_inventory ?item))))

(:action wait
  ; Wait for an entity to complete its transition
  :parameters (?entity - object)
  :precondition (in_transition ?entity)
  :effect (and 
           (completed_transition ?entity) 
           (not (in_transition ?entity))))
```
